title: "Visualizaci√≥n con D3plus"
format: html
---


```{r}
library(D3plusR)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
data <- data.frame(
  name = c("A", "B", "C"),
  value = c(10, 20, 30)
)

d3plus(data = data,
       type = "bar",
       id = "name") %>%
  d3plusX(value = "name") %>%
  d3plusY(value = "value")
```
